definition: there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing

sentences.english: He had formerly been in business at Bristol, but failed in debt to a number of people, compounded, and went to America.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏他專心一志地做生意，在幾年中就賺到許多錢。

sentences.english: When I come to Shengzhou, I always stay there.
sentences.chinese: 我每次來嵊舟，都會待在那裏。

sentences.english: I have an inspector and two officers waiting at the front door .
sentences.chinese: 我已派了一個巡官和兩個警官守候在前門那裏。

sentences.english: I know him quite well, and there are wheels within wheels.
sentences.chinese: 我很瞭解他，那裏的人事關係很複雜。

sentences.english: We stood there listening to our own breathing.
sentences.chinese: 我們站在那裏聆聽着我們自己的呼吸聲。

sentences.english: The road branches after the level-crossing.
sentences.chinese: 那兩條道路在那裏交叉。

sentences.english: But they, like Adam, have transgressed the covenant, there have they dealt treacherously against me.
sentences.chinese: 但是他們在阿當就違犯了盟約，在那裏已背叛了我。

sentences.english: I’m the one who put the ads there.
sentences.chinese: 我正是那個把廣告放在那裏的人。

sentences.english: He went to a warren in which there were a great number of rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 他到了一個養兔場，那裏有許多的兔子。

sentences.english: You never actually stood there and looked up at that beautiful ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 你從來沒有真正地站在那裏，看那美麗的天花板。

sentences.english: But you can exchange it for an international one at the sole agent's office.
sentences.chinese: 但你可以換取一張國際保用證，要到總代理那裏去換。

sentences.english: A: There’s a sign that says NO PARKING.
sentences.chinese: 那裏有塊“禁止停車”的標誌牌。

sentences.english: If you have been to Yangshuo, you must have been surprised by its green mountains and clear rivers.
sentences.chinese: 如果你曾經去過陽朔，你一定驚訝於那裏青山碧水。

sentences.english: Plastic bottles and buckets, even the sole of a shoe are all on display.
sentences.chinese: 塑料瓶和塑料桶，甚至還有鞋底都在那裏展示。

sentences.english: Expensive into mom to take care of small into also very tired, she fell asleep sitting there.
sentences.chinese: 貴成媽爲照顧小成也很累，她坐在那裏就睡着了。

definition: where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment/also written 哪裡|哪里
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment
suffix of a noun of locality

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
